resources.string: This role allows the application to capture the camera output and record audio and store it in external storage.
This role allows the application to capture location information.
This role allows the application to store and retrieve files in the SDCARD.
This role allows the application to send/read sms messages and call phones.
This role allows the application to read/write calendar events and read/write contacts.
This role allows the application to set wallpaper and wallpaper hints.
This role allows the application to read/write contacts to the device.
This role allows the application to make calls and read/write call logs.
This role allows the application to access bluetooth module.
This role allows the application to vibrate the device, access NFC module and access the internet.
This role allows apps to access the device location and camera.
